title: Attack flavour
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

Almost all monsters are capable of dealing physical damage to you by attacking in melee, but many of them also cause elemental damage or inflict a wide variety of detrimental [status effects](/Status_effect "Status effect"). What a monster's melee attacks are capable of is determined by the monster's **[attack flavour](/Category:Attack_flavours "Category:Attack flavours")**. These modify a monster's melee attacks in many ways, and apply whether the monster is attacking unarmed or while wielding a weapon.

| Flavour                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Example                                                                                                                                                             | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Plain](/Category:Plain_flavour "Category:Plain flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | g [![Goblin.png](/images/d/d2/Goblin.png)](/File:Goblin.png) **[Goblin](/Goblin "Goblin")**                                                                         | No special effects.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Reaching](/Category:Reach_flavour "Category:Reach flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | t [![Snapping turtle.png](/images/7/7b/Snapping_turtle.png)](/File:Snapping_turtle.png) **[Snapping turtle](/Snapping_turtle "Snapping turtle")**                   | Inherent [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching") (can melee attack from two tiles away).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Constrict](/Category:Constrict_type "Category:Constrict type")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | S [![Ball python.png](/images/4/40/Ball_python.png)](/File:Ball_python.png) **[Ball python](/Ball_python "Ball python")**                                           | Inflicts [constriction](/Constriction "Constriction") (pins victim in place, dealing damage over time).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Barbs](/Category:Barbs_flavour "Category:Barbs flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | w [![Steelbarb worm.png](/images/c/c5/Steelbarb_worm.png)](/File:Steelbarb_worm.png) **[Steelbarb worm](/Steelbarb_worm "Steelbarb worm")**                         | The attacker inflicts [barbs](/Barbs "Barbs") on the target when attacking, making further movement painful.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Trample](/Category:Trample_type "Category:Trample type")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | Y [![Elephant.png](/images/6/60/Elephant.png)](/File:Elephant.png) **[Elephant](/Elephant "Elephant")**                                                             | Has a chance of knocking the defender back one tile (chance depends on defender's [size](/Size "Size") relative to the attacker). If successful, the attacker moves into the tile the defender occupied.                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [Fire](/Category:Fire_flavour "Category:Fire flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | b [![Fire bat.png](/images/7/73/Fire_bat.png)](/File:Fire_bat.png) **[Fire bat](/Fire_bat "Fire bat")**                                                             | Adds [HD](/HD "HD") + 1d(HD) - 1 [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Pure fire](/Category:Pure_fire_flavour "Category:Pure fire flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | E [![Fire elemental.png](/images/6/6d/Fire_elemental.png)](/File:Fire_elemental.png) **[Fire elemental](/Fire_elemental "Fire elemental")**                         | Deals no physical damage. Consists solely of [HD](/HD "HD") + 1d(HD + 1) + (HD / 2) [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Sear](/Category:Sear_flavour "Category:Sear flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | n [![Searing wretch.png](/images/4/4e/Searing_wretch.png)](/File:Searing_wretch.png) **[Searing wretch](/Searing_wretch "Searing wretch")**                         | May strip one level of [fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") from the defender.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Cold](/Category:Cold_flavour "Category:Cold flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | Y [![Ice beast.png](/images/0/02/Ice_beast.png)](/File:Ice_beast.png) **[Ice beast](/Ice_beast "Ice beast")**                                                       | Adds HD + 1d(HD\*2) - 1 [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [Electricity](/Category:Electricity_flavour "Category:Electricity flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | Y [![Sky beast.png](/images/e/e7/Sky_beast.png)](/File:Sky_beast.png) **[Sky beast](/Sky_beast "Sky beast")**                                                       | Adds HD + 1d(HD/2) - 1 [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity") damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [Acid](/Category:Acid_flavour "Category:Acid flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | J [![Jelly.png](/images/0/05/Jelly.png)](/File:Jelly.png) **[Jelly](/Jelly "Jelly")**                                                                               | Splashes the defender with 4d3 [acid](/Acid "Acid") damage, dealing additional damage and possibly causing [corrosion](/Corrosion "Corrosion").                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Reach tongue](/Category:Reach_tongue_flavour "Category:Reach tongue flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | F [![Goliath frog.png](/images/5/50/Goliath_frog.png)](/File:Goliath_frog.png) **[Goliath frog](/Goliath_frog "Goliath frog")**                                     | Inherent [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching") and splashes the defender with [acid](/Acid "Acid"), possibly [corroding](/Corrosion "Corrosion") it.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Poison](/Category:Poison_flavour "Category:Poison flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | S [![Adder.png](/images/c/c2/Adder.png)](/File:Adder.png) **[Adder](/Adder "Adder")**                                                                               | Inflicts HD\*2 to HD\*4 poison damage, with a 1 in 3 chance to affect poison-resistant targets. See [poison types](/Poison#Poison_Types "Poison") for specifics.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Strong poison](/Category:Strong_poison_flavour "Category:Strong poison flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | s [![Redback.png](/images/8/82/Redback.png)](/File:Redback.png) **[Redback](/Redback "Redback")**                                                                   | Inflicts HD\*11/3 to HD\*13/2 poison damage, with a 1 in 3 chance to affect poison-resistant targets. See [poison types](/Poison#Poison_Types "Poison") for specifics.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Paralytic poison](/Category:Paralyse_flavour "Category:Paralyse flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | y [![Hornet.png](/images/7/72/Hornet.png)](/File:Hornet.png) **[Hornet](/Hornet "Hornet")**                                                                         | If not immune to poison, the defender will be poisoned, [slowed](/Slow "Slow") for 1d3 turns, and has a 1 in 6 chance to be [paralysed](/Paralysis "Paralysis") for 1d3 turns. Has a 1 in 3 chance to affect poison-resistant targets.                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Reach sting](/Category:Reach_sting_flavour "Category:Reach sting flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 4 [![Orange demon.png](/images/3/39/Orange_demon.png)](/File:Orange_demon.png) **[Orange demon](/Orange_demon "Orange demon")**                                     | Inherent [reaching](/Reaching "Reaching") and inflicts [poison](/Poison "Poison").                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Drown](/Category:Drown_flavour "Category:Drown flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | m [![Water nymph.png](/images/2/20/Water_nymph.png)](/File:Water_nymph.png) **[Water nymph](/Water_nymph "Water nymph")**                                           | Attacks do a small amount of [asphyxiation](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Engulf](/Category:Engulf_flavour "Category:Engulf flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | E [![Water elemental.png](/images/d/db/Water_elemental.png)](/File:Water_elemental.png) **[Water elemental](/Water_elemental "Water elemental")**                   | Attacks have a chance of engulfing the target, which continuously deals [asphyxiation](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") damage and mimics the effect of [silence](/Silence "Silence") on targets that need to breathe. Asphyxiation resistance negates both effects. Moving away from the attacker will break the engulf.                                                                                |
| [Holy](/Category:Holy_flavour "Category:Holy flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | D [![Pearl dragon.png](/images/e/e9/Pearl_dragon.png)](/File:Pearl_dragon.png) **[Pearl dragon](/Pearl_dragon "Pearl dragon")**                                     | Does an additional 75% damage against [evil](/Evil "Evil") and [unholy](/Unholy "Unholy") targets. This is similar to the [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") weapon brand, but without a random component.                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Distortion](/Category:Distort_flavour "Category:Distort flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | v [![Spatial vortex.png](/images/a/a5/Spatial_vortex.png)](/File:Spatial_vortex.png) **[Spatial vortex](/Spatial_vortex "Spatial vortex")**                         | Inherent [distortion](/Distortion "Distortion") brand (deals additional irresistible damage, causes the defender to [blink](/Blink "Blink"), or [banishes](/Banish "Banish") defender to [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss")).                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Rift](/Category:Rift_flavour "Category:Rift flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | P [![Starflower.png](/images/a/ac/Starflower.png)](/File:Starflower.png) **[Starflower](/Starflower "Starflower")**                                                 | [Smite-targeted](/Smite-targeted "Smite-targeted") attacks that can reach targets up to 3 tiles away. Also applies the [distortion](/Distortion "Distortion") brand.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [Pain](/Category:Pain_flavour "Category:Pain flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 5 [![Grinder.png](/images/2/21/Grinder.png)](/File:Grinder.png) **[Grinder](/Grinder "Grinder")**                                                                   | Inherent [pain](/Pain_\(brand\) "Pain (brand)") brand (deals [negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") damage based on attacker HD)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Drain XP](/Category:Drain_experience_flavour "Category:Drain experience flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | z [![Wight.png](/images/e/ec/Wight.png)](/File:Wight.png) **[Wight](/Wight "Wight")**                                                                               | Has a 50% chance of [draining](/Draining "Draining") the target (temporary max HP reduction vs. player, temporary HD loss vs. monsters). This only has a 3% chance of activating if the attack deals less than 6 damage, and a 33% chance if the attack normally does no damage (i.e., "touch"). In spite of the name, player experience is completely unaffected by this attack flavour.             |
| [Vampiric](/Category:Vampiric_flavour "Category:Vampiric flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | V [![Vampire (monster).png](/images/d/df/Vampire_%28monster%29.png)](/File:Vampire_\(monster\).png) **[Vampire](/Vampire_\(monster\) "Vampire (monster)")**         | Will [heal](/Heal "Heal") the attacker for 1d(damage inflicted) if the defender is [cold-blooded](/Cold-blooded "Cold-blooded") or [warm-blooded](/Warm-blooded "Warm-blooded"). Deals normal damage but has no healing effect against bloodless defenders.                                                                                                                                           |
| [Shadow stab](/Category:Shadow_stab_flavour "Category:Shadow stab flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | W [![Shadowghast.png](/images/7/71/Shadowghast.png)](/File:Shadowghast.png) **[Shadow](/Shadow "Shadow")**                                                          | When [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible") and not [back](/Corona "Corona")[lit](/Aura#Halo "Aura"), the attacker gains a boost to movement speed, 100% accuracy, and deals 2.5x damage for a single attack. If the defender has [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") it negates the extra damage and accuracy, but not the added speed. After the attack, the attacker's invisibility ends. |
| [Mutate](/Category:Mutate_flavour "Category:Mutate flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | & [![Mnoleg.png](/images/a/ad/Mnoleg.png)](/File:Mnoleg.png) **[Mnoleg](/Mnoleg "Mnoleg")**                                                                         | Each hit has a 25% chance of [malmutating](/Malmutating "Malmutating") the defender (or [polymorphing](/Polymorph "Polymorph") if the defender is a monster).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| Drain [strength](/Category:Drain_strength_flavour "Category:Drain strength flavour"), [dexterity](/Category:Drain_dexterity_flavour "Category:Drain dexterity flavour"), [intelligence](/Category:Drain_intelligence_flavour "Category:Drain intelligence flavour"), [stat](/Category:Drain_stat_flavour "Category:Drain stat flavour") | 5 [![Quasit.png](/images/1/1e/Quasit.png)](/File:Quasit.png) **[Quasit](/Quasit "Quasit")**                                                                         | May deal 1 point of [stat](/Stat "Stat") damage to the associated stat (33% chance per attack, or 5% if the attack did no damage. Each rank of [negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") resistance has a further 33% chance to negate the stat loss.).                                                                                                                                   |
| [Drain speed](/Category:Drain_speed_flavour "Category:Drain speed flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | W [![Wraith.png](/images/7/7c/Wraith.png)](/File:Wraith.png) **[Wraith](/Wraith "Wraith")**                                                                         | May [slow](/Slow "Slow") the victim.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [Scarab](/Category:Scarab_flavour "Category:Scarab flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | B [![Death scarab.png](/images/0/09/Death_scarab.png)](/File:Death_scarab.png) **[Death scarab](/Death_scarab "Death scarab")**                                     | Combines vampiric and drain speed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Ensnare](/Category:Ensnare_flavour "Category:Ensnare flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | s [![Jumping spider.png](/images/0/0f/Jumping_spider.png)](/File:Jumping_spider.png) **[Jumping spider](/Jumping_spider "Jumping spider")**                         | If the attack does any damage, it has a 50% chance of trapping the defender in a [web](/Web "Web").                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Steal](/Category:Steal_flavour "Category:Steal flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | f [![Maurice.png](/images/4/45/Maurice.png)](/File:Maurice.png) **[Maurice](/Maurice "Maurice")**                                                                   | Each attack steals one item from [inventory](/Inventory "Inventory") (only affects players).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Corrode](/Category:Corrode_flavour "Category:Corrode flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 4 [![Rust devil.png](/images/1/18/Rust_devil.png)](/File:Rust_devil.png) **[Rust devil](/Rust_devil "Rust devil")**                                                 | [Corrodes](/Corrode "Corrode") the defender.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Weakness](/Category:Weakness_flavour "Category:Weakness flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 4 [![Orange demon.png](/images/3/39/Orange_demon.png)](/File:Orange_demon.png) **[Orange demon](/Orange_demon "Orange demon")**                                     | Attacks have a chance to inflict [weakness](/Weak "Weak") on a target.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Sleep](/Category:Sleep_flavour "Category:Sleep flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | f [![Sleepcap.png](/images/2/20/Sleepcap.png)](/File:Sleepcap.png) **[Sleepcap](/Sleepcap "Sleepcap")**                                                             | Has a 50% chance of putting the defender to [sleep](/Sleep "Sleep") when dealing damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [Confuse](/Category:Confuse_flavour "Category:Confuse flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | s [![Tarantella.png](/images/e/ed/Tarantella.png)](/File:Tarantella.png) **[Tarantella](/Tarantella "Tarantella")**                                                 | Has a 33% chance of [confusing](/Confusing "Confusing") the defender, or 10% if the attack did less than 3 damage. Duration is 1d(HD + 3) / 10 turns, rounded up, with a cumulative maximum of 4 turns.                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Rage](/Category:Rage_flavour "Category:Rage flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | y [![Moth of wrath.png](/images/9/94/Moth_of_wrath.png)](/File:Moth_of_wrath.png) **[Moth of wrath](/Moth_of_wrath "Moth of wrath")**                               | Has a 33% chance of sending the defender into a [berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") rage, if it is capable of doing so.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Bloodzerk](/Category:Bloodzerk_flavour "Category:Bloodzerk flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | l [![Skyshark.png](/images/1/14/Skyshark.png)](/File:Skyshark.png) **[Skyshark](/Skyshark "Skyshark")**                                                             | When striking targets that bleed, the user is [strengthened](/Might "Might"), then sent into into a [berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") rage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Vulnerable](/Category:Vuln_flavour "Category:Vuln flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | W [![Phantasmal warrior.png](/images/7/71/Phantasmal_warrior.png)](/File:Phantasmal_warrior.png) **[Phantasmal warrior](/Phantasmal_warrior "Phantasmal warrior")** | Has a 33% chance of temporarily halving the defender's [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"). If the defender is already so afflicted, it instead increases the duration of the effect.                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [Antimagic](/Category:Antimagic_flavour "Category:Antimagic flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | S [![Mana viper.png](/images/1/1d/Mana_viper.png)](/File:Mana_viper.png) **[Mana viper](/Mana_viper "Mana viper")**                                                 | Inherent [antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic") brand (drains player [MP](/MP "MP"), or causes monsters to have a spell failure chance that rises with antimagic damage dealt and decreases with time).                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [Swoop](/Category:Swoop_flavour "Category:Swoop flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 4 [![Hellwing.png](/images/4/4a/Hellwing.png)](/File:Hellwing.png) **[Hellwing](/Hellwing "Hellwing")**                                                             | The attacker swoops in to perform a melee attack if far away.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Flank](/Category:Flank_flavour "Category:Flank flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 5 [![Ufetubus.png](/images/6/6c/Ufetubus.png)](/File:Ufetubus.png) **[Ufetubus](/Ufetubus "Ufetubus")**                                                             | Slips behind the target before attacking.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Blink](/Category:Blink_flavour "Category:Blink flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | F [![Blink frog.png](/images/2/24/Blink_frog.png)](/File:Blink_frog.png) **[Blink frog](/Blink_frog "Blink frog")**                                                 | The attacker has a 33% chance of [blinking](/Blink "Blink") after a successful hit.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Blink with](/Category:Blink_with_flavour "Category:Blink with flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | W [![Phantom.png](/images/e/ec/Phantom.png)](/File:Phantom.png) **[Phantom](/Phantom "Phantom")**                                                                   | After a successful hit, the attacker may [blink](/Blink "Blink") both itself and the defender.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Spider](/Category:Spider_flavour "Category:Spider flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | s [![Broodmother.png](/images/1/19/Broodmother.png)](/File:Broodmother.png) **[Broodmother](/Broodmother "Broodmother")**                                           | May summon a [spider](/List_of_arachnids "List of arachnids") when attacking.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Chaos](/Category:Chaos_flavour "Category:Chaos flavour")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 4 [![Chaos spawn.png](/images/e/e7/Chaos_spawn.png)](/File:Chaos_spawn.png) **[Chaos spawn](/Chaos_spawn "Chaos spawn")**                                           | Changes flavour with every attack, to one of the following:* [Fire](/Fire "Fire")
* [Cold](/Cold "Cold")
* [Electricity](/Electricity "Electricity")
* Strong [poison](/Poison "Poison")
* [Vampiric](/Vampiric "Vampiric")
* [Confusion](/Confusion "Confusion")
* "Pure" chaos, which has many different possible effects detailed on the [chaos](/Chaos "Chaos") page.                             |

## History

- [0.31](/0.31 "0.31") added the Flank flavour and removed the Sticky Flame flavour.

- [0.30](/0.30 "0.30") added the Sleep and Bloodzerk flavours.

- [0.29](/0.29 "0.29") added the Rift flavour.

- [0.28](/0.28 "0.28") removed the [Kite](/Category:Kite_flavour "Category:Kite flavour") flavour and added the Barbs and Spider flavours.

- [0.27](/0.27 "0.27") added the Blink with flavour.

- [0.26](/0.26 "0.26") removed the [Rot](/Category:Rot_flavour "Category:Rot flavour") and [Hunger](/Category:Hunger_flavour "Category:Hunger flavour") flavours; enemies that caused rot now inflict [draining](/Draining "Draining"), which now temporarily reduces the player's maximum HP.

- [0.23](/0.23 "0.23") removed the [Klown](/Category:Klown_flavour "Category:Klown flavour") flavour that could choose randomly between [Fire](/Fire "Fire"), [Cold](/Cold "Cold"), [Electricity](/Electricity "Electricity"), [Strong poison](/Poison "Poison"), [Drain speed](/Slow "Slow"), [Pain](/Pain_\(brand\) "Pain (brand)"), or [Antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic").

- Prior to [0.22](/0.22 "0.22"), [Engulf](/Category:Engulf_flavour "Category:Engulf flavour") applied a movement penalty, which doubled the player's movement delay.

- [0.19](/0.19 "0.19") removed the [Miasmata](/Category:Miasmata_flavour "Category:Miasmata flavour") flavour.

- [0.18](/0.18 "0.18") introduced the Miasmata flavour and removed the [Firebrand](/Category:Firebrand_flavour "Category:Firebrand flavour") flavour.

- [0.16](/0.16 "0.16") introduced the [Corrode](/Category:Corrode_flavour "Category:Corrode flavour"), [Scarab](/Category:Scarab_flavour "Category:Scarab flavour"), [Trample](/Category:Trample_flavour "Category:Trample flavour"), [Kite](/Category:Kite_flavour "Category:Kite flavour"), and [Swoop](/Category:Swoop_flavour "Category:Swoop flavour") flavours. It also made Drain Speed apply slow even through rN+.

- As of [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), the [Plague](/Category:Plague_flavour "Category:Plague flavour") flavour was removed and the [Sticky flame](/Category:Sticky_flame_flavour "Category:Sticky flame flavour") attack flavour was added. Item destruction was removed, reducing the threat from Fire and Cold attacks, as well as anything which can duplicate them (Chaos and Klown).

- [0.14](/0.14 "0.14") contained many monster flavour changes:

  - The Klown attack flavour chose from the following types: Fire, Cold, Nasty poison, Drain XP, Rot, Blink, and Anti-magic.
  - [Harpies](/Harpies "Harpies") had a Steal Food brand; attacks would occasionally consume one or more food items from your inventory or on the ground, if the target was standing on any food.
  - There were Poison (stat) attack flavours. These vaguely copied the Drain stat brand: they had a 33% chance of temporarily reducing a point of a given [stat](/Stat "Stat") if the target was not resistant to poison.
  - [Poison](/Poison "Poison")'s overhaul removed the Nasty Poison and Medium Poison attack flavours, as detailed in [poison types](/Poison#poison_types "Poison"). Each were moved to normal poison and strong poison as appropriate per monster.

- [0.13](/0.13 "0.13") removed the [Disease](/Category:Disease_flavour "Category:Disease flavour") flavour and introduced the Plague flavour.
html:
Attack flavour

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

Almost all monsters are capable of dealing physical damage to you by attacking in melee, but many of them also cause elemental damage or inflict a wide variety of detrimental status effects. What a monster's melee attacks are capable of is determined by the monster's attack flavour. These modify a monster's melee attacks in many ways, and apply whether the monster is attacking unarmed or while wielding a weapon.

Flavour Example Description
Plain g Goblin No special effects.
Reaching t Snapping turtle Inherent reaching (can melee attack from two tiles away).
Constrict S Ball python Inflicts constriction (pins victim in place, dealing damage over time).
Barbs w Steelbarb worm The attacker inflicts barbs on the target when attacking, making further movement painful.
Trample Y Elephant Has a chance of knocking the defender back one tile (chance depends on defender's size relative to the attacker). If successful, the attacker moves into the tile the defender occupied.
Fire b Fire bat Adds HD + 1d(HD) - 1 fire damage.
Pure fire E Fire elemental Deals no physical damage. Consists solely of HD + 1d(HD + 1) + (HD / 2) fire damage.
Sear n Searing wretch May strip one level of fire resistance from the defender.
Cold Y Ice beast Adds HD + 1d(HD*2) - 1 cold damage.
Electricity Y Sky beast Adds HD + 1d(HD/2) - 1 electricity damage.
Acid J Jelly Splashes the defender with 4d3 acid damage, dealing additional damage and possibly causing corrosion.
Reach tongue F Goliath frog Inherent reaching and splashes the defender with acid, possibly corroding it.
Poison S Adder Inflicts HD*2 to HD*4 poison damage, with a 1 in 3 chance to affect poison-resistant targets. See poison types for specifics.
Strong poison s Redback Inflicts HD*11/3 to HD*13/2 poison damage, with a 1 in 3 chance to affect poison-resistant targets. See poison types for specifics.
Paralytic poison y Hornet If not immune to poison, the defender will be poisoned, slowed for 1d3 turns, and has a 1 in 6 chance to be paralysed for 1d3 turns. Has a 1 in 3 chance to affect poison-resistant targets.
Reach sting 4 Orange demon Inherent reaching and inflicts poison.
Drown m Water nymph Attacks do a small amount of asphyxiation damage.
Engulf E Water elemental Attacks have a chance of engulfing the target, which continuously deals asphyxiation damage and mimics the effect of silence on targets that need to breathe. Asphyxiation resistance negates both effects. Moving away from the attacker will break the engulf.
Holy D Pearl dragon Does an additional 75% damage against evil and unholy targets. This is similar to the holy wrath weapon brand, but without a random component.
Distortion v Spatial vortex Inherent distortion brand (deals additional irresistible damage, causes the defender to blink, or banishes defender to the Abyss).
Rift P Starflower Smite-targeted attacks that can reach targets up to 3 tiles away. Also applies the distortion brand.
Pain 5 Grinder Inherent pain brand (deals negative energy damage based on attacker HD)
Drain XP z Wight Has a 50% chance of draining the target (temporary max HP reduction vs. player, temporary HD loss vs. monsters). This only has a 3% chance of activating if the attack deals less than 6 damage, and a 33% chance if the attack normally does no damage (i.e., "touch"). In spite of the name, player experience is completely unaffected by this attack flavour.
Vampiric V Vampire Will heal the attacker for 1d(damage inflicted) if the defender is cold-blooded or warm-blooded. Deals normal damage but has no healing effect against bloodless defenders.
Shadow stab W Shadow When invisible and not backlit, the attacker gains a boost to movement speed, 100% accuracy, and deals 2.5x damage for a single attack. If the defender has see invisible it negates the extra damage and accuracy, but not the added speed. After the attack, the attacker's invisibility ends.
Mutate & Mnoleg Each hit has a 25% chance of malmutating the defender (or polymorphing if the defender is a monster).
Drain strength, dexterity, intelligence, stat 5 Quasit May deal 1 point of stat damage to the associated stat (33% chance per attack, or 5% if the attack did no damage. Each rank of negative energy resistance has a further 33% chance to negate the stat loss.).
Drain speed W Wraith May slow the victim.
Scarab B Death scarab Combines vampiric and drain speed.
Ensnare s Jumping spider If the attack does any damage, it has a 50% chance of trapping the defender in a web.
Steal f Maurice Each attack steals one item from inventory (only affects players).
Corrode 4 Rust devil Corrodes the defender.
Weakness 4 Orange demon Attacks have a chance to inflict weakness on a target.
Sleep f Sleepcap Has a 50% chance of putting the defender to sleep when dealing damage.
Confuse s Tarantella Has a 33% chance of confusing the defender, or 10% if the attack did less than 3 damage. Duration is 1d(HD + 3) / 10 turns, rounded up, with a cumulative maximum of 4 turns.
Rage y Moth of wrath Has a 33% chance of sending the defender into a berserk rage, if it is capable of doing so.
Bloodzerk l Skyshark When striking targets that bleed, the user is strengthened, then sent into into a berserk rage.
Vulnerable W Phantasmal warrior Has a 33% chance of temporarily halving the defender's willpower. If the defender is already so afflicted, it instead increases the duration of the effect.
Antimagic S Mana viper Inherent antimagic brand (drains player MP, or causes monsters to have a spell failure chance that rises with antimagic damage dealt and decreases with time).
Swoop 4 Hellwing The attacker swoops in to perform a melee attack if far away.
Flank 5 Ufetubus Slips behind the target before attacking.
Blink F Blink frog The attacker has a 33% chance of blinking after a successful hit.
Blink with W Phantom After a successful hit, the attacker may blink both itself and the defender.
Spider s Broodmother May summon a spider when attacking.
Chaos 4 Chaos spawn Changes flavour with every attack, to one of the following:
  • Fire
  • Cold
  • Electricity
  • Strong poison
  • Vampiric
  • Confusion
  • "Pure" chaos, which has many different possible effects detailed on the chaos page.

History

  • 0.31 added the Flank flavour and removed the Sticky Flame flavour.
  • 0.30 added the Sleep and Bloodzerk flavours.
  • 0.29 added the Rift flavour.
  • 0.28 removed the Kite flavour and added the Barbs and Spider flavours.
  • 0.27 added the Blink with flavour.
  • 0.26 removed the Rot and Hunger flavours; enemies that caused rot now inflict draining, which now temporarily reduces the player's maximum HP.
  • 0.23 removed the Klown flavour that could choose randomly between Fire, Cold, Electricity, Strong poison, Drain speed, Pain, or Antimagic.
  • Prior to 0.22, Engulf applied a movement penalty, which doubled the player's movement delay.
  • 0.19 removed the Miasmata flavour.
  • 0.18 introduced the Miasmata flavour and removed the Firebrand flavour.
  • 0.16 introduced the Corrode, Scarab, Trample, Kite, and Swoop flavours. It also made Drain Speed apply slow even through rN+.
  • As of 0.15, the Plague flavour was removed and the Sticky flame attack flavour was added. Item destruction was removed, reducing the threat from Fire and Cold attacks, as well as anything which can duplicate them (Chaos and Klown).
  • 0.14 contained many monster flavour changes:
    • The Klown attack flavour chose from the following types: Fire, Cold, Nasty poison, Drain XP, Rot, Blink, and Anti-magic.
    • Harpies had a Steal Food brand; attacks would occasionally consume one or more food items from your inventory or on the ground, if the target was standing on any food.
    • There were Poison (stat) attack flavours. These vaguely copied the Drain stat brand: they had a 33% chance of temporarily reducing a point of a given stat if the target was not resistant to poison.
    • Poison's overhaul removed the Nasty Poison and Medium Poison attack flavours, as detailed in poison types. Each were moved to normal poison and strong poison as appropriate per monster.
  • 0.13 removed the Disease flavour and introduced the Plague flavour.

rawPage:
{{version031}}

Almost all monsters are capable of dealing physical damage to you by attacking in melee, but many of them also cause elemental damage or inflict a wide variety of detrimental [[status effect]]s. What a monster's melee attacks are capable of is determined by the monster's '''[[:Category:Attack flavours|attack flavour]]'''. These modify a monster's melee attacks in many ways, and apply whether the monster is attacking unarmed or while wielding a weapon.

!Example
!Description
|-
! [[:Category:Plain flavour|Plain]]
| {{monsterlink|Goblin}}
| No special effects.
|-
! [[:Category:Reach flavour|Reaching]]
| {{Monsterlink|Snapping turtle}}
| Inherent [[reaching]] (can melee attack from two tiles away).
|-
! [[:Category:Constrict type|Constrict]]
| {{Monsterlink|Ball python}}
| Inflicts [[constriction]] (pins victim in place, dealing damage over time).
|-
! [[:Category:Barbs flavour|Barbs]]
| {{Monsterlink|Steelbarb worm}}
| The attacker inflicts [[barbs]] on the target when attacking, making further movement painful.
|-
! [[:Category:Trample type|Trample]]
| {{Monsterlink|Elephant}}
| Has a chance of knocking the defender back one tile (chance depends on defender's [[size]] relative to the attacker). If successful, the attacker moves into the tile the defender occupied.
|-
! [[:Category:Fire flavour|Fire]]
| {{Monsterlink|Fire bat}}
| Adds [[HD]] + 1d(HD) - 1 [[fire]] damage. 
|-
! [[:Category:Pure fire flavour|Pure fire]]

| Deals no physical damage. Consists solely of [[HD]] + 1d(HD + 1) + (HD / 2) [[fire]] damage.

| {{Monsterlink|Searing wretch}}

|-

! [[:Category:Electricity flavour|Electricity]]

|-

|-
! [[:Category:Poison flavour|Poison]]

| {{Monsterlink|Hornet}}
| If not immune to poison, the defender will be poisoned, [[slow]]ed for 1d3 turns, and has a 1 in 6 chance to be [[paralysis|paralysed]] for 1d3 turns. Has a 1 in 3 chance to affect poison-resistant targets.

! [[:Category:Reach sting flavour|Reach sting]]

|-
! [[:Category:Drown flavour|Drown]]

| Attacks do a small amount of [[asphyxiation]] damage.

! [[:Category:Engulf flavour|Engulf]]

! [[:Category:Holy flavour|Holy]]
| {{Monsterlink|Pearl dragon}}

! [[:Category:Distort flavour|Distortion]]
| {{Monsterlink|Spatial vortex}}
| Inherent [[distortion]] brand (deals additional irresistible damage, causes the defender to [[blink]], or [[banish]]es defender to [[the Abyss]]).
|-
! [[:Category:Rift flavour|Rift]]
| {{Monsterlink|Starflower}}
| [[Smite-targeted]] attacks that can reach targets up to 3 tiles away. Also applies the [[distortion]] brand.

! [[:Category:Pain flavour|Pain]]

This only has a 3% chance of activating if the attack deals less than 6 damage, and a 33% chance if the attack normally does no damage (i.e., "touch"). In spite of the name, player experience is completely unaffected by this attack flavour.

! [[:Category:Vampiric flavour|Vampiric]]

! [[:Category:Shadow stab flavour|Shadow stab]]
| {{Monsterlink|Shadow}}
| When [[invisible]] and not [[Corona|back]][[Aura#Halo|lit]], the attacker gains a boost to movement speed, 100% accuracy, and deals 2.5x damage for a single attack. If the defender has [[see invisible]] it negates the extra damage and accuracy, but not the added speed. After the attack, the attacker's invisibility ends.

==History==
*[[0.31]] added the Flank flavour and removed the Sticky Flame flavour.
*[[0.30]] added the Sleep and Bloodzerk flavours.
*[[0.29]] added the Rift flavour.
*[[0.28]] removed the [[:Category:Kite flavour|Kite]] flavour and added the Barbs and Spider flavours.
*[[0.27]] added the Blink with flavour.
*[[0.26]] removed the [[:Category:Rot flavour|Rot]] and [[:Category:Hunger flavour|Hunger]] flavours; enemies that caused rot now inflict [[draining]], which now temporarily reduces the player's maximum HP.
*[[0.23]] removed the [[:Category:Klown flavour|Klown]] flavour that could choose randomly between [[Fire]], [[Cold]], [[Electricity]], [[Poison|Strong poison]], [[Slow|Drain speed]], [[Pain (brand)|Pain]], or [[Antimagic]].
*Prior to [[0.22]], [[:Category:Engulf flavour|Engulf]] applied a movement penalty, which doubled the player's movement delay.
*[[0.19]] removed the [[:Category:Miasmata flavour|Miasmata]] flavour.
*[[0.18]] introduced the Miasmata flavour and removed the [[:Category:Firebrand flavour|Firebrand]] flavour.
*[[0.16]] introduced the [[:Category:corrode flavour|Corrode]], [[:Category:scarab flavour|Scarab]], [[:Category:trample flavour|Trample]], [[:Category:kite flavour|Kite]], and [[:Category:swoop flavour|Swoop]] flavours. It also made Drain Speed apply slow even through rN+.
*As of [[0.15]], the [[:Category:Plague flavour|Plague]] flavour was removed and the [[:Category:Sticky flame flavour|Sticky flame]] attack flavour was added. Item destruction was removed, reducing the threat from Fire and Cold attacks, as well as anything which can duplicate them (Chaos and Klown).
*[[0.14]] contained many monster flavour changes:
**The Klown attack flavour chose from the following types: Fire, Cold, Nasty poison, Drain XP, Rot, Blink, and Anti-magic.
**[[Harpies]] had a Steal Food brand; attacks would occasionally consume one or more food items from your inventory or on the ground, if the target was standing on any food.
**There were Poison (stat) attack flavours. These vaguely copied the Drain stat brand: they had a 33% chance of temporarily reducing a point of a given [[stat]] if the target was not resistant to poison.
**[[Poison]]'s overhaul removed the Nasty Poison and Medium Poison attack flavours, as detailed in [[poison#poison types|poison types]]. Each were moved to normal poison and strong poison as appropriate per monster.
*[[0.13]] removed the [[:Category:Disease flavour|Disease]] flavour and introduced the Plague flavour.
[[Category:Attack flavours|*]]
